opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, ISTRA, ŽMINJ, 145 m2, 4-sobna Prodaje se kuća u izgradnji s bazenom u naselju Klimni (mjesto Žminj) u srcu Istre, površine 145 m2 te okućnice 1000 m2. Kuća je prizemnica te se sastoji od dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, tri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, zasebonog wc-a, izbe, hodnika te prekrasne terase na kojoj se nalazi grijani bazen površine 42 m2. Pogled kuće je neometan i jedinstven prema brdima Limskog kanala. Orijentaca kuće : prema jugu je otvorena kuhinja, blagovanje i dnevni boravak, a prema istoku tri spavaće sobe. Na taj način kuća se štiti od okolnih pogleda i stvara vlastitu intimu i mir s bazenom u sredini i velikim sunčalištem oko njega. Nadstrešnica ispred dnevnog boravka štiti da sunce nebi ljeti direktno ulazilo u prostor i pregrijavalo ga, a dok zimi, kada je sunce niže, ipak ulazi sunčevo svjetlo i prirodno zagrijava prostor. Mikrolokacija je sjajno povezana s čitavom Istrom, blizina Rovinja i Pule te aerodroma u Puli. Kuća zbog svog koncepta i sjajne lokacije idealna je za investiciju. Kuća će biti izgrađena u svibnju 2024. godine. Kroz cijelu kuću je provedeno grijanje i hlađenje putem Mitsubishi kanalnih jedinica, gdje svaka soba i dnevni boravak imaju autonomni sustav. Kupaone su grijanje električnim radijatorima i podnim grijanjem. Sustav je pogonjen Viessmann Vitosol dizalicom topline sa solarnim kolektorom na krovu. Bazen ima mogućnost grijanja vode putem dizalica topline. Kuća posjeduje 2 parkirna mjesta. U samnom mjestu Žminj nalaze se trgovina te mnoštvo ugostiteljskih objekata. HOUSE, FOR SALE, ISTRIA, ŽMINJ, 145 m2, 4-bedroom For sale: a house under construction with a pool in the settlement of Klimni (Žminj) in the heart of Istria, with a living area of 145 m2 and a plot of 1000 m2. The house is a single-story structure consisting of a living room with a kitchen and dining area, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a separate toilet, storage, a hallway, and a beautiful terrace with a heated pool measuring 42 m2. The house offers an unobstructed and unique view of the hills of the Limski Canal. House orientation: The kitchen, dining, and living areas open to the south, while the three bedrooms face east. This design shields the house from surrounding views, creating its own privacy and tranquility with the pool in the middle and a large sunbathing area around it. The roofed area in front of the living room prevents direct sunlight from entering the space and overheating it during the summer, while allowing natural sunlight to warm the space during the lower sun angle in winter. The microlocation is excellently connected to the entire Istria region, with close proximity to Rovinj and Pula, as well as the Pula Airport. Due to its concept and excellent location, the house is ideal for investment purposes. The house is scheduled to be completed in May 2024. The entire house is equipped with heating and cooling systems through Mitsubishi ducted units, where each room and the living room have autonomous systems. Bathrooms are heated with electric radiators and underfloor heating. The system is powered by a Viessmann Vitosol heat pump with a solar collector on the roof. The pool has the capability to heat water using heat pumps. The house includes 2 parking spaces. In the village of Žminj itself, there is a shop and numerous hospitality establishments.
